Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Loaded = Tool:WaitForChild("Loaded") PauseScript = script:WaitForChild("PauseScript")
PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Meshes = { Cannon = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=155461643", CannonWithAnchor = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=155460734", Anchor = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=155461628" }
Grips = { Cannon = CFrame.new(0.061999999, -0.5, 1.25, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), CannonWithAnchor = CFrame.new(0.0625, -0.5, 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
ReloadTime = 3
Damage = 60
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false Loaded.Value = false local Anchor = Handle:Clone() Anchor.Mesh.MeshId = Meshes.Anchor Anchor.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 1.5, 2) Debris:AddItem(Anchor, 3) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(((Anchor:GetMass() * 100) * 100), ((Anchor:GetMass() * 100) * 100), ((Anchor:GetMass() * 100) * 100)) BodyVelocity.Parent = Anchor PlaySound.Value = "AnchorShot" local HitDebounce = false Anchor.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and not HitDebounce then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and humanoid and character ~= Character then HitDebounce = true if not humanoid:FindFirstChild(PauseScript.Name) then local PauseScriptClone = PauseScript:Clone() PauseScriptClone.Disabled = false PauseScriptClone.Parent = humanoid end Anchor:Destroy() end end end) Anchor.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Anchor.CFrame = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint) Anchor.CFrame = Anchor.CFrame + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * Handle.Size.Z BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(Anchor.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint).lookVector * 100 wait(ReloadTime) Loaded.Value = true Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Player) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Mesh.MeshId = ((Loaded.Value and Meshes.CannonWithAnchor) or Meshes.Cannon) Tool.Grip = ((Loaded.Value and Grips.CannonWithAnchor) or Grips.Cannon) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Loaded.Value = true Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() end
Loaded.Changed:connect(function() Mesh.MeshId = ((Loaded.Value and Meshes.CannonWithAnchor) or Meshes.Cannon) Tool.Grip = ((Loaded.Value and Grips.CannonWithAnchor) or Grips.Cannon) end)
for i, v in pairs(Meshes) do ContentProvider:Preload(v) end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent OriginalWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(10) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed
script:Destroy()

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Tool:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
PlaySound.Value = ""
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local Sound = Handle:FindFirstChild(PlaySound.Value) if Sound then Sound:Play() end PlaySound.Value = "" end end)
